text-typewriter/default.highlightedCode:
import { TextTypewriter } from '@/components/ui/text-typewriter';

export default function Component() {
  return (
    <div className="space-y-8">
      <div className="space-y-4">
        <h3 className="text-lg font-semibold">Single Text</h3>
        <TextTypewriter
          text="Creating beautiful interfaces with smooth animations"
          className="text-2xl font-bold bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-600 via-purple-600 to-pink-600 bg-clip-text text-transparent"
          speed={80}
        />
      </div>

      <div className="space-y-4">
        <h3 className="text-lg font-semibold">Multiple Texts (Loop)</h3>
        <TextTypewriter
          texts={[
            "Build stunning UIs",
            "Create smooth animations", 
            "Design with purpose",
            "Code with passion"
          ]}
          className="text-3xl font-bold bg-gradient-to-r from-emerald-500 via-teal-500 to-cyan-500 bg-clip-text text-transparent"
          speed={100}
          loop
          pauseDuration={1500}
        />
      </div>

      <div className="space-y-4">
        <h3 className="text-lg font-semibold">Custom Cursor</h3>
        <TextTypewriter
          text="Customizable cursor animation"
          className="text-xl font-medium bg-gradient-to-r from-orange-500 to-red-500 bg-clip-text text-transparent"
          cursor="▋"
          speed={120}
        />
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}
